name: Edmond Scientific
overview: Edmond Scientific Company provides professional, analytical, training, and engineering support services. The company offers litigation support services; document management services, including imaging, Web content management, electronic mail, records management, workflow, collaboration, online forms, inquiries, self service and processing, and media and publishing; engineering services for electronic, electrical, optical, aerospace, and mechanical systems, which comprise re-engineering/reverse engineering, reliability and maintainability engineering, statistical modeling/failure forecasting, data collection and analyses, test and evaluation, systems design and engineering, component engineering design and analysis, and component repair and remanufacture services. It also provides logistical solutions, such as logistics and obsolescence management, forecasting and tracking, remediation, configuration and inventory management, sparing and depot operations, statistical analysis, and cost analysis; and health informatics services, which comprise health needs assessment, business process management, executive and clinical information systems, revenue cycle management, health care financial management and reimbursement, patient identification and matching, privacy and authorization mechanisms, and health data supply. In addition, the company offers simulation solutions, including operation and maintenance, software rehost/redesign, parts obsolescence, configuration management, reliability engineering, and simulator and classroom instruction. Further, it provides EZACCESS, which processes raw input electronic data and performs de-duping, indexing, searching, tiffing, and load files generation functions; and NatiVIEW, a Web hosted native file format review tool. The company serves health care, legal, government, manufacturing, and financial services industries. Edmond Scientific Company was founded in 1997 and is based in Fairfax, Virginia.

acquisitions.source_description: Edmond Scientific Company Acquires E-Discovery Vanguard: Access Litigation
